subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the significance of the Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर मेहनगर क्षेत्रों का महत्व क्या है?
C_en: A symbol of Jodhpur's rich cultural heritage
D_en: A military stronghold built by Rao Jodhmal
explanation_en: The Mehrangarh Fort, located in Jodhpur, is a symbol of the rich cultural heritage of the city and the state. It was built by Rao Jodhmal and serves as a popular tourist destination.
explanation_hi: जोधपुर में संतुल पुल के रूपांत्रों के मेर्नियां के संतुल पुल के से बना
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort, located in Jodhpur, was built by Rao Jodhmal and represents the rich cultural heritage of the region. It is a popular tourist attraction.
explanation_hi: जोधपुर मेर्नियां के संतुल पुल के से बना
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort, built by Rana Kumbha, is a historical monument and showcases the architectural excellence of the Chauhan Dynasty. It is not a tourist attraction.
explanation_hi: रानी कुम्ब्ह के संतुल पुल के से बना
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort, constructed by Maharaja Chhatrasal, is a majestic fort and a significant historical site representing the Rajput culture. It is a prominent tourist attraction.
Varendra Fort was built by Maharaja Surajmal of Banswara. It showcases the cultural aspects of the Marwar region and serves as a historical site.
Ranisagar is a reservoir built by Maharaja Sambhu Singh of Banswara. It is a symbol of the Rajput culture and serves as a popular picnic spot.
Shekhawati Fort was established by Maharaja Sardul Singh. It highlights the art and architecture of the Shekhawati region and attracts history enthusiasts.
